meanings.definition: A statement or theory that is put forward as a premise to be maintained or proved.
meanings.sent1: Her thesis about the importance of recycling was well-argued.
meanings.sent2: The scientist presented a thesis on the effects of climate change.
meanings.sent3: His thesis on the benefits of napping was both informative and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The idea that laughter is the best medicine became the thesis of his comedy routine.
meanings.sent5: The thesis that kindness can change the world resonated with many people.

meanings.definition: A long essay or dissertation involving personal research, written by a candidate for a university degree.
meanings.sent1: She spent months working on her thesis about ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The student defended his thesis in front of the academic committee.
meanings.sent3: His thesis on the history of video games was a labor of love.
meanings.sent4: The journey of self-discovery became the thesis of her memoir.
meanings.sent5: The thesis on sustainable farming practices was groundbreaking in the agricultural community.
